abstract: Intel has been frustrated with cable content providers and might sell to Verizon, people with direct knowledge of the discussions said.
snippet: Intel has been frustrated with cable content providers and might sell to Verizon, people with direct knowledge of the discussions said.
lead_paragraph: Intel may bow out of its ambitious cable-television-via-the-Internet venture, known as OnCue, by selling it to Verizon, according to people with direct knowledge of the talks between the two companies.

headline.main: Intel Is Said to Weigh Sale of Online Cable TV Venture
headline.print_headline: Intel Is Said to Weigh Sale of Online Cable TV Venture
